div.class: wsite-section wsite-body-section wsite-section-bg-image wsite-section-effect-reveal wsite-background-107 wsite-custom-background

div.strong: As we are moving through this time of change, we are building a platform to make contact with our staff easier. This platform is under construction, but as it evolves we encourage our parents to use it as a "one-stop shop." You can access the platform by utilizing the button below, accessing the link on the GRAFORD ISD Facebook page, or with the quick links button on our home page.

Breakfast and Lunch are available at Graford ISD for children 18 and under at no charge during the COVID-19 school closure. Meals are being served To-Go at the rear entrance of the kitchen.
Meals will be delivered at 11-11:30 AM to The Chamber Parking Lot.
Meals will consist of a lunch and include a breakfast meal of cereal, fruit, juice, and milk.

a.span: CLICK FOR INFO ABOUT FREE MEALS FOR KIDS
